item.description:
Well, when life gives you lemons, make lemonade.  Let's take advantage of this fantastic snow and get out for a great ski on Saturday.  As Jack is in Hawaii (!!!) he has asked me to schedule the below Meetup.

Open to all abilities, we will break up into groups based on experience/fitness. Bring a picnic lunch if you like, there is no food service at Great Brook, just cookies and cocoa. 

Be INSIDE the barn by the big door and READY TO SKI by 10:00 AM. Great Brook rents all kinds of gear rental fee $13, trail passes are $12, and it is CASH ONLY * CASH ONLY * CASH ONLY.

Please correspond with each other if you need a ride.

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Great Brook XC Ski Saturday
